name: Fast Adventure
description: The game tittle is FastAdventure. Is a platform 2D game, with many enemies and traps and twists. Is a fun game for experienced gamers and for not so experienced, stages go from the easiest to the hardest but maintaining the fun enviroment for the players.  We love 2D games from GB color, SNES and all those awesome classics. The game have awesome 20 stages, in which you'll find many enemies, coins, traps, a background story and a final boss (can you find the way to kill him?.This a hint: go beyond the limits).  All the games we create havent Ads, we decided to prevent our players to have a cut experience while playing, we just want them to enjoy the develop of their gameplay with no interruptions and live all the fun moments as we wanted them to be.  Hope you enjoy it.
